<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="">[Teamster](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=41)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Fall of Plaguestone](/Sources.aspx?ID=3) pg. 55</row>

</column>

You left your home a few months back for a life on the road, working for one caravan company and then another, always on the lookout for a new job and a better life. Last week, you were hired by the Bort Bargith’s company in Elidir. You don’t know anyone from the company just yet, but most of its members seem to be honest merchants and traders.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Strength
or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) skill, and the [Mercantile Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Train Animal](/Feats.aspx?ID=856) skill feat.
